authors: Iron PDF & Ocr Joint Teams http://ironsoftware.com
description:
PDF Complete by Iron Software is a full suite of C# & VB.Net PDF tools:
It includes PDF generation, html-to-pdf, editing and OCR in 17 international languages.

Iron's PDF Complete creates & edits PDFs as well as reading and extracting PDF & Image text content. The library allows developers to add PDF & OCR functions to MVC, Desktop, Console and Web applications.

* IronPDF includes: "Html-To-Pdf" to render PDFs from standard file formats: HTML, JS, CSS, JPG, PNG, GIF, and SVG. "Url-To-Pdf" generates PDFs from an existing URL's html page. "ASPX-To-Pdf" converts ASP.NET documents into pdfs.  IronPDF allows developers to Merge, Split and Manipulate PDFs as well as adding Page Numbers, Headers, Footers, Watermarks, Tables, Text and Image Assets. Code Samples and tutorials available at http://ironpdf.com

* PDF Complete adds an advanced PDF OCR (Optical Character Recognition) & Barcode reading library. The engine pre-processes scans to improve resolution, color simplification and contrast as well as reducing background noise, rotation, page distortion, and page skewing. It detects image quality and adjusts pre-processing automatically for great results every time. Content output as plain text, barcode data or as structured data. Multiple Language packs available at http://ironsoftware.com/csharp/ocr/

Windows .Net Framework 4.0 required. Can be installed on cloud hosting such as Microsoft Azure or Amazon Web Services. 

Licensing & Support available for commercial deployments. For code examples, documentation & more visit http://ironpdf.com. For support please email us at developers@ironsoftware.com
releaseNotes: The new "PDF.OCR" Complete Package Combines IronOCR with IronPDF to create additional methods for PDF data extraction by merging the power of both libraries.
summary:
Complete C# PDF & OCR Library by IronSoftware.  

Key Features:
- Pdf OCR in 17 Languages
- Pdf Barcode & QR Reading
- Html To Pdf
- Aspx To Pdf
- Edit & Merge
- Unlock and Encrypt PDFs
title: C# PDF & OCR Complete by Iron Software
